name: Thomas' Basics in teamwork and learning
name_original: Thomas' Basics in teamwork and learning
description:
A mod of Baldi's Basics in the style of Thomas and friends

Original game made by Mystman12

Thomas and friends based on the railway series made by Rev. W Awdry

There's a way to cheat in the game, Find it!!!

If someone can modify the audio I'll tank him/her to much

Thomas' field trip, birthday bash now!!!
